titles: An elegie upon the death of that renovvned heroe Coll. Rainsborrow. Who vvas traiterously murthered on Munday Octob. 19. 1648.
author: Alleyn, Thomas.
notes: Verse - "Something it was, that made the envious stars".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Rainborow, Thomas, d. 1648 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
